channel.title: I can't compile my client
channel.description:
hey, when i compile my client, i get this [code]Compiling...
The system cannot find the path specified.
Compiling Completed ! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] i don't know what to change to get it to compile. here is my compilers code [code]@echo off Title Client Compiler color 00 echo Compiling... echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac" *.java -nowarn *.java color 00 echo. echo Compiling Completed !
pause [/code]

i did. hmmm…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2007, 05:44:26 PM[/size][hr]WOOT! i fixed it! Thanks guys!

item.title: I can't compile my client

item.description:
@system wrote:

Change the number to your java version.

what do i change it to?uhhh rofl ill figure it out. thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2007, 05:42:10 PM[/size][hr]ugh, i still get the error…

item.title: I can't compile my client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Poo fish, edit the number:

[code]@echo off
Title Client Compiler
color 00
echo Compiling…
echo.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_#NUMBER#\bin\javac” *.java -nowarn *.java
color 00
echo.
echo Compiling Completed !

pause [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: I can't compile my client
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

alrighty, much appreciated!
EDIT: would a server source compiler work for a client compiler? my server compiler works anyway.

Read full topic

Hmm, uhhhh… Do you want my compile.bat codes? It would end your problem right there.

item.title: I can't compile my client
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

No, you need to set your paths in your environment variables correctly in your system’s advanced settings.

Read full topic
